UtWindowDispatchingReporter
UtCompositeReporter
UtWindowDispatchingReporter

Forward all messages (unchanged) to a window-based reporter or to a fall-back reporter. When the run starts, the current window is captured. If there is a reporter registered for that window, that reporter (and that reporter alone) is sent the messages for that run.  If there is no reporter registered, the fall-back reporter is sent the messages. This allows per-window reporters that are isolated from each other.

Functions
ut window dispatching reporter

Factory for UtWindowDispatchingReporter
